Detailed Description

Renderable class used for rendering shapes from continuous lines.

The position, rotation, and scale of any SceneNodes using this Component will be taken into account when rendering.

Definition at line 48 of file LineRenderable.cpp.

void LineRenderable::render ( SceneNode *const   node,
const hgeVector &  screenPosition,
Camera *const   cam 
) [virtual]

Core render method.

The other render methods call this method once it has been determined that the object should be rendered. This is the Template method.

Parameters:
node The node whose position, rotation, and scale are going to be used to render the object.
screenPosition The position to render the object at transformed into screen space.

Implements Renderable.
